## OmvDataSource.setDataFilter() method

Set a new data filter. Can also be done during the creation of an \[\[OmvDataSource\]\]. Will be applied to the decoder, which might be shared with other omv datasources.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDataFilter(filterDescription: OmvFeatureFilterDescription): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filterDescription | [OmvFeatureFilterDescription](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescription.md) | Data filter description created with \[\[OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
